product.sm10.pcd.battlemind.name: Battle Mind
product.sm10.pcd.battlemind.sell-text: Combine raw heat and psychic prowess for an attack that’s hard to stop! Mewtwo’s Mind Report Ability recovers the awesome Welder Supporter card, so you can keep your Fire-type Pokémon totally fired up. Incineroar adds fuel to the fire in the Battle Mind theme deck!
product.sm10.pcd.lightningloop.name: Lightning Loop
product.sm10.pcd.lightningloop.sell-text: The Mythical Pokémon Zeraora leads the charge in this looping electrical wonder! This deck recycles Lightning Energy with Magnezone, so you always have plenty to fuel Zeraora’s powerful Discharge attack. Dodrio and Raticate step in as quick attackers in the Lightning Loop theme deck!
specialvisualizations.sm10_109.rulerofth: This player can't play any Pokémon Tool, Special Energy, or Stadium cards from their hand.
specialvisualizations.sm10_12.shinobimas: Damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon is prevented.
specialvisualizations.sm10_120.fullmetal: This player's {M} Pokémon take 30 less damage from the opponent's attacks.
specialvisualizations.sm10_122.hairwall: This player's {M} Pokémon take less damage from the opponent's attacks
specialvisualizations.sm10_148.gathering: This player's Pokémon that have the Caturday attack ignore all Energy in their attack costs.
specialvisualizations.sm10_163.forcecanc: This player's Pokémon are immune to all effects, including damage, of the opponent's GX attacks.
specialvisualizations.sm10_178.ltsurgess: This player can play 3 Supporter cards this turn.
specialvisualizations.sm10_188.ultrafore: This player's Ultra Beasts' attacks aren't affected by any effects on the opponent's Active Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.sm10_74.detentiong: This player's Basic Pokémon get 1 damage counter between turns.
specialvisualizations.sm10_76.benchbarri: This player's Benched Pokémon take no damage from the opponent's attacks.
specialvisualizations.sm10_82.acmeofhero: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, it is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.
specialvisualizations.specificattackdoes: This Pokémon's {0} attack does less damage.
